actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.
Executive Comment Requested from Justice, State.
House Committee on Foreign Affairs Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
House Committee on The Judiciary Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Laid on Table in House by Voice Vote.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A resolution directing the Secretary of State to provide to the House of Representatives certain information concerning the pending extradition proceedings against Ziad Abu Eain.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of State to furnish to the House of Representatives specified information regarding the extradition of Ziad Abu Eain to Israel, including all documents the Secretary possesses relating to: (1) the Secretary's review of the proposed extradition; (2) the extradition proceedings conducted by the U.S. magistrate; (3) any interpretation of the applicable language of the Convention on Extradition between the United States and Israel; (4) the treatment in Israel of persons extradited to Israel and of Palestinians charged with terrorist or political offenses; and (5) the adverse foreign policy repercussions of extraditing Ziad Abu Eain and of not extraditing him.

titles.title: A resolution directing the Secretary of State to provide to the House of Representatives certain information concerning the pending extradition proceedings against Ziad Abu Eain.
